name: Biba`s Adventures — Hardcore Platformer
description:
Biba`s Adventures - it is a fun adventures, where you have to the finish alive, and it's not as simple as it seems at first glance... Biba actually does not like water and sharp objects, so, you have to be careful!
Overcome obstacles, avoid water, open chests and collect many coins!

You can also compete with friends and the whole community to be the best!
Leaderboard, best players, all this is waiting for you, join us!
Save coins to use them to gain competitive advantage.
Get achievements in the game and compete with other users in your skills!

  • Nice graphics
  • Great visual effects
  • Fun music
  • Responsive control
  • Different enemies
  • Competitive mode
